item.title: Legislative Council panel visits Hutti gold mines in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[A delegation from the Legislative Councilâ€™s Committee on Government Assurances, led by its chairman T.A. Sharavana, visited the Hutti Gold Mines in Lingsugur taluk in Raichur district of Karnataka on June 11 to inspect the operations, and review employee welfare and safety standards.
The visit began with an underground tour of the gold mine, where legislators descended nearly one kilometre to observe the gold extraction process. The team later inspected the ore processing division, where Deputy...]]>
